text: Hey, I'm trying to post my theme to marketplace and I'm stuck on Theme Validation Error. It shows the list of all my modules, but when I go to Design Tools, I see `no errors found` info. All modules work properly, because I have them live on my page. And all of them were created inside Design Tools in HubSpot. What am I missing? Could someone help please? Thanks!
Is there any source code for the comments module?

I ran into similar issues and contacted <mailto:marketplace@HubSpot.com|marketplace@HubSpot.com> for help. They have a log file that can give you more detail on what to fix.

If you have renamed your modules or moved files into to subfolders, check your module paths and make them relative. ../../modules instead /modules
Jacob looks like an html file is linked, do you think you could link the JS file running into this?
I ran into a similar issue and it ended up being a really simple thing that I missed. Check all your modules to make sure they have custom icons.
